Package kea.kinoBackend.security.for_security_tests

Class ControllerToTestRoles

java.lang.Object
kea.kinoBackend.security.for_security_tests.ControllerToTestRoles
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/security-tests") @Profile("test") public class ControllerToTestRoles extends Object
Controller meant solely to test the authorization of the roles. This controller is only loaded when the "test" profile is active, so it does not interfere with your real controllers
